mapper.select: SELECT sp.save_point_seq savePointSeq, sp.point savePoint, sp.save_type saveType, sp.reg_date saveRegDate, sp.exp_date saveExpDate, up.use_point_seq usePointSeq, up.point usePoint, up.use_type useType, up.reg_date useRegDate FROM save_point sp, detail_point dp, use_point up WHERE sp.save_point_seq = dp.save_point_seq AND dp.use_point_seq = up.use_point_seq AND member_id = #{memberId}
